pTagCards.activeTab: Shows the active content that are activated.
pTagCards.draftTab: Shows the active content that are saved but not published
pTagCards.inactiveTab: Shows the active content that are deactivated.
pTagCards.favoriteTab: Shows the active content that are added to favorites.
pTagCards.searchField: Search for active content by its name
pTagCards.viewPerformanceSummaryBttn: Get an overview of your active content's impact, including total opens, clicks, and click-through rate (CTR) over a specific period.
pTagCards.createActiveContentBttn: Begin creating active content with a variety of blocks and formatting tools. Ready to go live? Publish your design directly from here.
pTagCards.viewCreatedDetails1: Shows a snapshot of the active content, including its name, tags, and performance metrics. You can add the active content to favorites, copy, edit, or deactivate it.
pTagCards.viewCreatedDetails2: Shows a snapshot of your active content, including its name, tags. You can add the active content to favorites, view draft, or delete it.
pTagCards.viewCreatedDetails3: Shows a snapshot of the active content, including its name, tags, and performance metrics. You can add the active content to favorites or activate it.
pTagCards.viewCreatedDetails4: Shows a snapshot of your active content, including its name, tags. You can remove the active content from favorites, view draft, or delete it.

pTagEditor.settingBttn: Choose how long to cache active content, from 1 hour (default) to 24 hours maximum. Note: Cache duration can't be changed once the content is published. Cached content speeds up response times by reusing the initial content creation for up to an hour.
pTagEditor.saveBttn: Save your work-in-progress content along with all settings. Find it later under the Draft tab
pTagEditor.saveAndPublishBttn: Ready to share your content? Save and publish to make it live. It'll appear under the Active tab.
pTagEditor.enableFailsafe: Check this box to design a backup plan for your active content, ensuring reliability.
pTagEditor.tagParameterBttn: Click here to add tag parameters you want to use in your active content template.
pTagEditor.mergeTagsBttn: Click here to add merge tags to personalize your message with dynamic content. For example, use {Customer.FullName} merge tag to include the customer’s full name dynamically wherever this merge tag is placed in your active content template.
pTagEditor.simulateBttn: After designing your active content, click here to preview and test the active content before making it live.
pTagEditor.clipboardBttn: Click here to view and copy tags from your clipboard for easy use.
